name: AS9
description:
OVERVIEW

Multiverse Adventure is a two-player racing and battle game. The game has two levels, each an obstacle race-course of a different kind – the first is a horizontal level and the second is a vertical one. In Level1, players race and fight with each other to reach the door to enter the next level. Enemies and obstacles along the way also damage their health. In level 2, players climb up the platforms and fight for the gem (Heart of Energy). Level2 also has trees of life, touching which replenishes the player’s health.

Characters: the Butterfly, Rock Scientist, Cyber Samurai, the Boy

—————————————————————————————————————————————

CONTROL

Play in full-screen.

Player#1: Arrow Keys to move; Press M to attack

Player#2: WASD to move; Press Q to attack
